title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Drift Week Slides into GTA Online
content:
Los Santos power slides into Drift Week with panache. Claim a brand-new drift vehicle for free and open up a world of corner-hugging precision with Drift Tuning Upgrades on four more rides. Plus, earn race rewards along with doubled payouts across some of Los Santosâ€™ most intense showdowns.

The Drift Tuning Upgrade is now available for the Bravado Gauntlet Hellfire (Muscle), Annis Hardy (Sedan), Vapid Dominator FX (Muscle, 50% off), and Dinka Chavos V6 (Sedan, 50% off).
